title: Coronation Street's Alan Halsall urged to propose to 'gorgeous' girlfriend Tisha Merry
text:

Alan Halsall's fans are desperate for him to pop the question to stunning new girlfriend Tisha Merry.

The Coronation Street star, who plays Tyrone Dobbs in the ITV soap, just moved in with Tisha last month.

The actor moved Tish, who appeared in the soap as Steph Britton, into the £750,000 house in Worsley, near Manchester, that he built with his ex-wife Lucy-Jo Hudson.

After the split, Alan and Tish got together at the start of the year, and are now happily co-habitating.

But fans are still dying to see them take the next step.

After Alan, 37, took to Instagram to share a loved-up snap of him and his lady, people urged him to ask her to marry him.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

In the sweet picture, Alan is dressed smartly in a white shirt and black jumper, and holds onto a glass of bubbly.

Tisha, 25, looks stunning in a strappy black top with a floral design and black skinny jeans as she throws her arm around his shoulders.

"Great Food And Great Company Are Two Of Life's Simplest Yet Greatest Pleasures," he said as he shared it with his fans.

One told him: "She's a real beauty , marry her quick"

(Image: Manchester Evening News)

Another said: "Awwww made me smile beautiful couple"

While another said: "Gorgeous picture!"

Alan's co-star Samia Longchambon got involved too.

The actress, who plays Maria Connor, commented: "ah u two!"

(Image: Instagram)

Alan, who shares six-year-old daughter Sienna with ex Lucy-Jo, is said to be blissfully happy after finding love with Tisha.

As they moved in together, a source told The Sun : "Tisha is keeping her place on for now but she’s living at Alan's place full time.

"She has been so good for him and really made him smile again. They are very similar and love to work out together so they have lots of the same interests and Sienna adores her."
